title.narrative: Reviving Primary Education in Rural Communities of Sierra Leone

description.narrative: The aim of this project is to reduce poverty through realising the educational rights of 15,000 children, who have few opportunities to access a good quality education. The project will lead to: improved completion, participation and quality of education; improved attitudes and practice towards girlsâ€™ education; and increased school capacity to mobilise human and financial resources to address pupilâ€™s needs. ;

activity-date.narrative: Project closed following a 3-month no cost extension (due to Ebola)
